name: UPSQUID
description:
[ ＣＯＮＴＲＯＬＳ － ＱＷＥＲＴＹ ]

LEFT / RIGHT ARROW KEYS (DOWN)....AIM
LEFT / RIGHT ARROW KEYS (RELEASE)....THRUST

[ ＣＯＮＴＲＯＬＳ － ＧＡＭＥＰＡＤ ]

LEFT / RIGHT SHOULDER BUTTONS

[ ＥＸＰＬＡＮＡＴＩＯＮ ]

Snack on little creatures! Snacks replenish energy!
Thrusting depletes energy! Don't run out of energy!
Don't fall behind or you'll go back to sleep!

HOLD BOTH KEYS WHEN COMBO GAUGE
IS FULL FOR OVER-BOOST

For $1 you help the continued development
of UPSQUID and gain access to the Native
Windows version as well as all future versions.

COMING SOON: Android and Newgrounds!

UPDATE: I've disabled payments for the time being
because users aren't able to run the game in Windows!
Will re-enable as soon as I find the problem :)

UPDATE 1/10/2016: Still working on problem, bugging
all the smart folks I can find, hopefully things will be
fixed ASAP! Thanks to Wesley for helping me test!

[ made in 48 hours for ludum dare 34 ]
